creator: Game Tap
descriptionHtml:
In Futuristic Helicopter Rescue Simulator Flying you can be a helicopter pilot of the world's most powerful futuristic helicopters. As a pilot you can fly across the world with your rescue helicopter in helicopter games. This helicopter simulation is a helicopter game by Game Tap with realistic and stunning 3D graphics. Futuristic flying game is flight control simulation with rescue scenarios.
Simulation game has immersive game play with best helicopter flying chopper game. Choose any of the rotary or fixed-wing aircraft to complete each challenging rescue mission with helicopter simulator.
Take flight from helipad and whirl through sky in amazing rescue helicopters to explore city, forests, hills and mountains in order to rescue public. Unique levels in city helicopter game won’t let you get bored.
Rescue people in emergencies and transport them in your chopper to safe places to complete the rescue operation. In helicopter rescue games you have to pick up victims of car accidents or natural disasters.
If you like rescue helicopter games you will enjoy this army helicopter rescue game that has many unique challenges and missions to not let you get bored. Feel the thrill of helicopter rescue games and adrenaline rush of playing helicopter transport games.
In Helicopter ambulance game by GAME TAP learn how to fly heli copter, improve your flying skills in helicopter flying simulator and help in rescue duties of helicopter flying games. Rescue squad has to transport accident victims to hospitals in helicopter hill rescue and copter simulator.
Use the futuristic rescue copter and airlift destroyed vehicles in realistic flying simulation. The target of flying rescue helicopter is to fly to different locations and pickup victims within specific timeline.
Download the free helicopter rescue game that is one of the best helicopter games. Join the rescue team and become flight pilot of an air ambulance in Futuristic Helicopter Rescue Simulator Flying.
descriptionShort: Be a helicopter pilot in Futuristic Helicopter Rescue Simulator of Flying games!
